mapper.insert: insert into cart (cartnum, id, pnum, pqty) values (cartSeq.nextval, #{id},#{pnum},#{pqty})
mapper.select:
select c.cartnum, p.pnum, p.pname, c.id, m.name, p.pimage,p.pspec, c.pqty, p.price, p.ppoint, (price*c.pqty)totprice, (ppoint*c.pqty)totpoint
from member m, cart c, product p
where m.id = c.id and c.pnum = p.pnum and c.id=#{id} order by cartnum
mapper.update: update cart set cart.pqty=#{pqty} where cartnum = #{cartnum}
